/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is framed by a large concrete overpass, its curved arches adding an architectural interest to the cityscape. Cars and buses traverse the street, adding a dynamic element to the scene. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a vibrant backdrop to the urban landscape. In the distance, buildings rise, their details softened by the distance. The image is bathed in natural light, highlighting the colors and textures of the scene.
